name: John Casablanca Institute
tag_list: hair-school-vancouver, design-schools-vancouver, fashion-schools-vancouver, beauty-schools-vancouver, hairdressing-schools-vancouver, make-up-schools-vancouver, fashion-design-school-vancouver, cosmetology-school-vancouver, nail-technician-vancouver, esth
overview:
The JCI was established in Vancouver over 3 decades ago and sets the the industry standard for top professionals in the area of hair and make up.

We at JCI feel that a supportive and positive learning practice prepares students with the most constructive educational experience. We are recognized for our well-disposed and nurturing approach to education, and define the class sizes to aerate student/instructor communication and improve the quality of training you get.

Our staff is inclusive of top working professionals and guest teachers from various fields. Our instructors and undergraduates continue to win awards and be identified as the most skillful workers in the industry.

With blooming careers as award-winning makeup artists graduates of JC Institute continue to shine
